content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --PRESP
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: --OCCUR
      operator: empty
    - name: --STAT
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: NOT DONE
Core:
  Id: CORE-000117
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --STAT not equal to 'NOT DONE' when --PRESP = 'Y'
  and --OCCUR is null
Outcome:
  Message: --STAT should equal 'NOT DONE' when --PRESP = 'Y' and --OCCUR = null
  Output Variables:
    - --STAT
    - --PRESP
    - --OCCUR
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0081
              Version: '1.0'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: An indication that the event was prospectively stated
                  or detailed on the CRF.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --PRESP
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: An indication as to whether a prespecified event has
                  occurred.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --OCCUR
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: Used to indicate when a question about the occurrence
                  of a prespecified event was not answered.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: STAT
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: An indication that the intervention was prospectively
                  stated or detailed on the CRF.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --PRESP
                Section: Interventions
              - Cited Guidance: An indication as to whether a prespecified intervention
                  has occurred.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --OCCUR
                Section: Interventions
              - Cited Guidance: Used to indicate when a question about the occurrence
                  of a prespecified intervention was not answered. Should be null
                  or have a value of "NOT DONE".
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: STAT
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - DS
      - DV
      - EX

json.Description: Raise an error when --STAT not equal to 'NOT DONE' when --PRESP = 'Y' and --OCCUR is null

Outcome.Message: --STAT should equal 'NOT DONE' when --PRESP = 'Y' and --OCCUR = null

Citations.Cited_Guidance: An indication that the event was prospectively stated or detailed on the CRF.
An indication as to whether a prespecified event has occurred.
Used to indicate when a question about the occurrence of a prespecified event was not answered.
An indication that the intervention was prospectively stated or detailed on the CRF.
An indication as to whether a prespecified intervention has occurred.
Used to indicate when a question about the occurrence of a prespecified intervention was not answered. Should be null or have a value of "NOT DONE".
